text: Emilie Cosman, known as Milein Cosman, (31 March 1921 â€“ 21 November 2017) was a German-born British artist. She was born in Gotha, Germany. She was best known for her drawings and prints of leading cultural figures, dancers and musicians in action, such as Francis Bacon, Mikhail Baryshnikov, T. S. Eliot and Igor Stravinsky. Cosman died in London on 21 November 2017 at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Works in the National Portrait Gallery * Milein Cosman's page at Camden Printmakers * Interview with Milein Cosman on BBC radio * Milein Cosman at Lebrecht Music and Arts Photo Library Category:1921 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British illustrators
title: Milein Cosman
